apptext.mostafa_basic01: Here with 42 Words you can turn tiles, move and drop them. Like with Tetris.
apptext.mostafa_basic02: Try to build words with at least four letters.
apptext.mostafa_basic03: If a beginning of a word is found it is colored. Then you can complete it.
apptext.mostafa_basic04: First you can build word with a word value of four, four common letters.
apptext.mostafa_basic05: A completed word you can choose or reject.
apptext.mostafa_advanced02: You can select and deselect words.
apptext.mostafa_advanced03: If more than one letter fits at a certain position, you'll see such a question mark.
apptext.mostafa_advanced04: With a tap you can select the current letter.
apptext.mostafa_advanced05: See the I, that is missing in the word TRAIN? It has to go down one line.
apptext.mostafa_advanced06: You can make it like that ...
apptext.mostafa_advanced07: I delete the line. All yellow marked boxes remain.
apptext.mostafa_advanced08: This way the I can fall down.
apptext.mostafa_advanced10:
By the way:
The highest word value is 42.
